title: Kryptowerk
author: Kryptowerk
created_time: June 20, 2022, 03:49:10 PMLast edit: June 24, 2022, 12:47:11 AM by Kryptowerk
content: Shoutout to Frank Alpencoin for starting it and MrCryptHodl and Eclipse33 for continuing this great idea!Up for raffle aretwo lots with each:1x 2019 brass finish Moonbits loaded with 0.001 BTC + 1x 2018 copper Bitcoin penny.Includes free (untracked) international shipping.RULES- Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)- Requirements: Jr Member and up . Below Jr Member you can participate if you have 2+ positive trust or a copper forum membership- Last number of the hash of the two blocks I choose will be the winners.00 - sam0001 - PM-ICT02 - GazetaBitcoin03 - Sunny 04 - zipreg05 - 5tift06 - Danydee07 - krogoth08 - Buchi-8809 - Real-Duke10 - Saxoshi11 - Yoda13 - SwissCrab14 - ChiBitCTy17 - Cryptogreatdane19 - Mbitr 20 - NeuroticFish21 - The_Crypto_Kid22 - Frank AlpenCoin23 - Spoki51 25 - Humble Bitcoiners27 - Crytocanuk28 - bct_ail29 - Streissi30 - Darker4531 - PawGo32 - Jambo USA33 - Eclipse33 34 - examplens35 - TopTort77736 - -doubleU-37 - Dernoste39 - rat03gopoh41 - JanEmil42 - tweetious43 - cygan45 - CARIBBEAN_TREASURES48 - Koal-8451 - Ratimov52 - digicoinuser54 - 2stout57 - 1miau58 - Remsjack61 - geophphreigh67 - TheBeardedBaby68 - buckrogers69 - hookzup170 - markzellers72 - owlcatz74 - MoparMiningLLC 76 - bitbollo81 - CoinageMint82 - tldr-hodl83 - haloxon88 - xyz92 - turbodogma93 - tread9396 - ragilab97 - doblezero98 - DirtyBirdE99 - Willi9974

comments.body: 88  - xyzMany thanks @5tift! Today is the "raffle-day" So many great raffles...

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: Thank you @Kryptowerk for this cool raffle. I like the small BitcoinPennys and would be happy to get a 2018 for my little collection  I want to try my luck with the Number#36 - -doubleU-Thank you and good luck to all other participants.
